message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $130.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm really interested, but $130 is a bit more than I'm comfortable spending right now. How about $125?
I understand you're looking to save a bit, Bob! I can do $128, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
